lyrics_abstract:
If you're sleeping are you dreaming
If you're dreaming are you dreaming of me?
I can't believe you actually picked me.

Mother: Hi Justin! This is your mother. It's 2:33 on Monday afternoon. I was just calling to see how you were doing. You sounded really uptight last night, it made me a little nervous, and well it made me nervous that it sounded like you were nervous too.I just wan[...]
